title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s core repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama for chat, completion, and embeddings pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that plugs into any local Ollama instance.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, and async support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI for chatting, pulling, and benchmarking models in your terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template combining Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain for private document Q&A.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Electron desktop client for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama services inside CI/CD for testing LLM workflows.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Official docs and helper scripts for running Ollama on NVIDIA GPUs with CUDA.

title: ollama-llamafile
summary: Mozilla’s llamafile lets you bundle Ollama models into single portable binaries.

title: r/ollama – Local LLM community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama-based projects.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp, text-generation-webui, and commercial APIs.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples for dev and prod.
